General.Name: Sanghvi Movers Limited
General.Description: Sanghvi Movers Limited operates as a crane rental company in India. The company provides heavy lifting and transportation solutions for infrastructure, power, oil & gas, construction, and other industries. It operates a fleet of medium to large size hydraulic truck mounted telescopic and lattice boom cranes, as well as hydraulic and crawler cranes. The company's equipment includes crawler mounted cranes with lattice boom and truck mounted cranes with telescopic boom. It serves construction, oil & gas, power, heavy engineering, wind energy, steel, and cement industries. The company was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Pune, India.
